channel.title: [Hyperion] Teleports
channel.description:
Well in my Hyperion server the first thing I am doing is teleports to kind of familiarize myself with the different coding. Well I got the teleport coords working and the animation working (partially). My problem is my character teleports then does the emote, plus my character shrinks and stays that way so then I can't move and barely see my character. This is my code
[code] case 1167: //lumbridge teleport player.playAnimation(Animation.TELEPORT); player.setTeleportTarget(Location.create(3223, 3218, 0)); break;[/code]
I have tried switching the code around and I can't seem to find any delay or wait command that goes in the actionbutton packet, So if anyone has any ideas I would appreciate it =)
[b]In other words how do I add a timer?[/b]
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/34i0ff7/7]Teleport Problem Video[/URL]

item.title: [Hyperion] Teleports
item.dc:creator: @RealmofTerror RealmofTerror
item.description:
@RealmofTerror wrote:

Basically you just told me to do what I’m asking you how to do…

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] Teleports
item.dc:creator: @RealmofTerror RealmofTerror
item.description:
@RealmofTerror wrote:

Well in my Hyperion server the first thing I am doing is teleports to kind of familiarize myself with the different coding. Well I got the teleport coords working and the animation working (partially). My problem is my character teleports then does the emote, plus my character shrinks and stays that way so then I can’t move and barely see my character. This is my code

case 1167: //lumbridge teleport player.playAnimation(Animation.TELEPORT); player.setTeleportTarget(Location.create(3223, 3218, 0)); break;

I have tried switching the code around and I can’t seem to find any delay or wait command that goes in the actionbutton packet, So if anyone has any ideas I would appreciate it =)

In other words how do I add a timer?

Teleport Problem Video
